# [FEAT] NPS Surveys

## Labels
`reporting`, `customer-experience`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement Net Promoter Score (NPS) surveys to measure customer loyalty.

## Requirements

### NPS Survey
- Standard 0-10 NPS question
- "How likely to recommend" format
- Follow-up questions
- Comment collection
- Branded surveys

### Survey Delivery
- Scheduled surveys
- Triggered surveys
- Email delivery
- Web/in-app surveys
- Survey links

### NPS Calculation
- Promoters (9-10)
- Passives (7-8)
- Detractors (0-6)
- NPS score (-100 to +100)
- Trend tracking

### Survey Configuration
- Survey frequency
- Customer segmentation
- Survey timing
- Response limits
- Follow-up rules

### NPS Reporting
- Overall NPS score
- NPS trends
- NPS by segment
- NPS by product/service
- Response distribution
- Benchmark comparisons

### Integration
- CRM integration
- Marketing automation
- Customer health scoring
- Churn prediction

## Zendesk Reference
Net Promoter Score (NPS) predicts the likelihood of a customer returning and helps measure overall customer loyalty.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] NPS survey works
- [ ] Score calculation correct
- [ ] Reporting available
- [ ] Segmentation works
- [ ] Integration capabilities
